src/lib/components/Quill.react.js.description: A Quill-Based Rich Text Editor Component for Dash

id.description:
The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.
slateContent={SlateRTE.deserializeHTMLString(value)}

value.description: The value displayed in the input.

charCount.description: The number of charaters in the editor (excl HTML)

modules.description:
The toolbar options modules.
Should be {'toolbar':[list of options]}

formats.description:
A list of formats that are recognized.
Should be [list of options]

placeholder.description: Placeholder text to show when editor is empty.

readOnly.description: Whether to instantiate the editor to read-only mode.

preserveWhitespace.description: If true, a pre tag is used for the editor area instead of the default div tag. This prevents Quill from collapsing continuous whitespaces on paste. https://github.com/slab/quill/issues/1751

theme.description: Name of theme to use. The builtin options are "bubble" or "snow".

style.description: An object with custom CSS rules to apply on the editor's container

tabIndex.description: The order in which the editor becomes focused, among other controls in the page, during keyboard navigation.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.
